D.content: Littré: déclenchement, triggering a machine, release of a machine, lever la clenche, open a door, speak
D.linkedContent: Littré: déclenchement, triggering a machine, release of a machine, lever la clenche, open a door, speak

D.content: technicity as metaphor that transports life into death, a non-accidental extra, which, in its act of falling (en y tombant): la branche (plugs it in) et la déclenche (and triggers it off): “force vivante”
D.linkedContent: technicity as metaphor that transports life into death, a non-accidental extra, which, in its act of falling (en y tombant): la branche (plugs it in) et la déclenche (and triggers it off): “force vivante”

D.content: knife, obsessive, phallus that threatens & is threatened, la menace du coupe-papier dont saigna la tranche rouge ouvre ou érige (which the red edge bled opens or erects), thus broaching/breaching (entamant) in a stroke (d’un trait) the decision: opens mouth > operation of reading/writing
D.linkedContent: knife, obsessive, phallus that threatens & is threatened, la menace du coupe-papier dont saigna la tranche rouge ouvre ou érige (which the red edge bled opens or erects), thus broaching/breaching (entamant) in a stroke (d’un trait) the decision: opens mouth > operation of reading/writing

D.content: proliferation, substitution of the unit that adds & effaces itself, counts itself out (se décomptant) at moment of déclenchement; Sollers: “participating in the calculation that effaced us and replaced us”
D.linkedContent: proliferation, substitution of the unit that adds & effaces itself, counts itself out (se décomptant) at moment of déclenchement; Sollers: “participating in the calculation that effaced us and replaced us”

D.content: nothing says present better, it seems, than il y a; but what is present is a scission, il y a cette coupure, what is present & at work is a “recoil (recul),” possibility of its triggering
D.linkedContent: nothing says present better, it seems, than il y a; but what is present is a scission, il y a cette coupure, what is present & at work is a “recoil (recul),” possibility of its triggering

D.content: presence as product, tombe déjà comme un effet, sous le coup (under the sway) d’une structure machinée qui ne se livre (gives itself away) pas au présent
D.linkedContent: presence as product, tombe déjà comme un effet, sous le coup (under the sway) d’une structure machinée qui ne se livre (gives itself away) pas au présent

SPEC.content: déclencheur (trigger-effect) of the déchaînement, unbinding, destricturation > repetition compulsion & death drive unbind from all contracture
SPEC.linkedContent: déclencheur (trigger-effect) of the déchaînement, unbinding, destricturation > repetition compulsion & death drive unbind from all contracture
